p: Fifteen essential oils from the aerial parts of Algerian S. rosmarinus were investigated by Hendel et al. [ 51]. All the samples showed moderate antioxidant activity, being the half-maximal scavenging concentration (SC 50) values in the range of 120.4–326.1 μL/mL. The antioxidant activity of S. rosmarinus essential oil from France was confirmed by Miladi et al. [ 52] who found a greater activity with IC 50 value of 189 μg/mL in DPPH test.
